00002 def hamming(ind, best, worst = None):
00003     sumValue = 0
00004     for i in xrange(len(ind.genome['grid'])):
00005         if ind.genome['grid'][i] == best.genome['grid'][i]:
00006             sumValue += 1
00007         if not (ind.genome['grid'][i] == worst.genome['grid'][i]):
00008             sumValue += 1
00009 
00010     if worst:
00011         for i in xrange(len(ind.genome['style'])):
00012             if ind.genome['style'][i] == best.genome['style'][i]:
00013                 sumValue += 1
00014             if not (ind.genome['style'][i] == worst.genome['style'][i]):
00015                 sumValue += 1
00016 
00017     return sumValue
00018

00021 def bitHamming(ind, best, worst = None):
00022     sumValue = 0
00023     if worst:
00024         for i in xrange(len(ind.genome)):
00025             if ind.genome[i] == best.genome[i]:
00026                 sumValue += 1
00027             if not (ind.genome[i] == worst.genome[i]):
00028                 sumValue += 1
00029     else:
00030         for i in xrange(len(ind.genome)):
00031             if ind.genome[i] == best.genome[i]:
00032                 sumValue += 1
00033 
00034     return sumValue

00038 def lcs(x, y):
00039     m = len(x)
00040     n = len(y)
00041 
00042     c = [[0]*(n+1)]*(m+1)
00043 
00044     for i in xrange(1, m+1):
00045         for j in xrange(1, n+1):
00046             if x[i-1] == y[j-1]:
00047                 c[i][j] = c[i-1][j-1] + 1
00048             elif c[i-1][j] >= c[i][j-1]:
00049                 c[i][j] = c[i-1][j]
00050             else:
00051                 c[i][j] = c[i][j-1]
00052 
00053     return c[-1][-1]
00054
